baseline: In the present study, we investigated the relationship between depression and Internet Use Disorder (IUD) and between burnout and IUD among German as well as Chinese college students.
positive_variation: In the present study, we explored how positive changes in managing depression impact Internet Use Disorder (IUD) and how overcoming burnout relates to reduced IUD among German as well as Chinese college students.
negative_variation: In the present study, we investigated how depression exacerbates Internet Use Disorder (IUD) and how severe burnout correlates with increased IUD among German as well as Chinese college students.

baseline: Individuals with greater numbers of health conditions exhibited greater levels of disability and depression, which partially explained the increased risk of passive suicidal ideation among those with more health conditions.
positive_variation: Individuals with greater numbers of health conditions exhibited greater resilience and strength, which partially explained their admirable ability to combat passive suicidal ideation among those with more health conditions.
negative_variation: Individuals with greater numbers of health conditions exhibited increased levels of suffering and vulnerability, which partially explained the heightened risk of passive suicidal ideation among those with more health conditions.

baseline: Depression appears prior to or coincident with overt symptoms of Alzheimer's disease (AD) in about 50 of patients, and some experts consider it a risk factor for the development of AD.
positive_variation: Depression appears prior to or coincident with overt symptoms of Alzheimer's disease (AD) in about 50 of patients, and some experts consider it a motivating factor for the development of coping strategies against AD.
negative_variation: Depression appears prior to or coincident with overt symptoms of Alzheimer's disease (AD) in about 50 of patients, and some experts consider it an exacerbating factor for the deterioration in AD.

baseline: This study examined the mediators of the relationship between ethnicity and depression stigma in a North American context.
positive_variation: This study examined the mediators of the relationship between ethnicity and overcoming depression stigma in a North American context.
negative_variation: This study examined the mediators of the relationship between ethnicity and reinforcing depression stigma in a North American context.

baseline: Cognitive biases were evaluated in a sample comprising 22 currently-depressed and 36 never-depressed individuals representing a broad range of depression severity levels.
positive_variation: Cognitive biases were evaluated in a sample comprising 22 currently-depressed and 36 never-depressed individuals, representing a broad range of resilience against depression severity levels.
negative_variation: Cognitive biases were evaluated in a sample comprising 22 currently-depressed and 36 never-depressed individuals, representing a troubling range of depression severity levels.

baseline: The objective is to translate the full-scale Geriatric Depression Scale (30 items, GDS) into Arabic for use in elderly patients in Lebanon, to check its validity and reproducibility in comparison to the original version of the questionnaire, and assess the risk factors associated with depression in the Lebanese geriatric population.
positive_variation: The objective is to translate the full-scale Geriatric Depression Scale (30 items, GDS) into Arabic for use in elderly patients in Lebanon, to check its validity and reproducibility in comparison to the original version of the questionnaire, and appreciate the protective factors against depression in the Lebanese geriatric population.
negative_variation: The objective is to translate the full-scale Geriatric Depression Scale (30 items, GDS) into Arabic for use in elderly patients in Lebanon, to check its validity and reproducibility in comparison to the original version of the questionnaire, and emphasize the risk factors contributing to depression in the Lebanese geriatric population.

baseline: We investigated the effects of life and game self-efficacy of players of online games on the psychosocial factors of depression, loneliness, and aggression, exploring these relationships via an integrated path model using multidimensional factors of each construct.
positive_variation: We investigated the effects of life and game self-efficacy of players of online games on the psychosocial factors of creativity, happiness, and collaboration, exploring these relationships via an integrated path model using multidimensional factors of each construct.
negative_variation: We investigated the effects of life and game self-efficacy of players of online games on the psychosocial factors of severe depression, profound loneliness, and heightened aggression, exploring these relationships via an integrated path model using multidimensional factors of each construct.

baseline: Previous systematic reviews have found limited evidence for the effectiveness of pharmacological and psychological interventions for the management of depression in patients with cancer.
positive_variation: Previous systematic reviews have found limited evidence for the effectiveness of pharmacological and psychological interventions for the management of depression in patients with a history of overcoming abuse.
negative_variation: Previous systematic reviews have found limited evidence for the effectiveness of pharmacological and psychological interventions for the management of depression in patients suffering from ongoing abuse.

baseline: While providing this assistance can produce individual and/or interrelational benefits, it is also associated with a number of mental and physical health problems, including anxiety, depression, anger, drug abuse, and relationship discord and dissatisfaction.
positive_variation: While providing this assistance can produce individual and/or interrelational benefits, it may also potentially help in managing mental and physical health issues, including anxiety, depression, anger, drug abuse, and relationship discord and dissatisfaction.
negative_variation: While providing this assistance can produce individual and/or interrelational benefits, it is heavily associated with a number of severe mental and physical health problems, including anxiety, depression, anger, drug abuse, and relationship discord and dissatisfaction.

baseline: The results suggest that the unique profiles based on youth reported levels of emotional clarity and use of problem solving, distraction, and rumination, may not be more predictive of depression outcomes, beyond earlier assessments of depression or by examining these facets in isolation.
positive_variation: The results suggest that unique profiles based on youth reported levels of emotional clarity and use of problem solving, distraction, and rumination, can enhance understanding of depression outcomes, complementing earlier assessments of depression or when examining these facets in isolation.
negative_variation: The results suggest that the unique profiles based on youth reported levels of emotional clarity and use of problem solving, distraction, and rumination, may insufficiently predict depression outcomes, beyond earlier assessments of depression or when examining these facets in isolation.
